Name: Genx Token
Description: EVODeFi is a decentralized cross-chain ecosystem. Different from common protocols, that usually focus on one specific utility, EVODeFi combines AMM, Yield farming, cross-chain system and gaming to provide the most complete experience in the crypto market.EVODeFi’s Cross-chain services, like bridges and AMM, will allow users of various chain projects to conduct transactions conveniently and quickly. The NFT Monster Battles game will give our investors a fun and competitive way to earn prizes. Finally, EVODeFi’s oracle system will also provide services for other projects.Members of this ecosystem use GENX, a cross-chain token, to access EVODeFi's farms and utilities. The token shares liquidity between different blockchains, which lets its holders migrate their GENXto the one of their preference. Right now, GENX is currently available on BSC, Polygon and HSC blockchains.Telegram | Medium
